ChangeNote: Rounding rule field was fixed

When a SimCorp Dimension installation have too many open alerts (> 10.000) the Business rules alerts service could become unresponsive during processing of alert changes and therefore were shutdown by the service platform. The error has been fixed. In addition the service now logs a warning before every new change processing  in case the SimCorp Dimension installation has more than 10.000 open alerts.
Flaky test ignored
Flaky test ignored
Changed title of "Asset Manager Cache monitor" from using the "AM"-abbreviation to "Asset Manager"
Add Flexible Analytics IK to Benchmark Aggregation Calculation fact
Fix failed tests due to changed output format. Does not affect business logic.
Pre-trade results have grown in size because information irrelevant to the performed pre-trade check is included in the results. This has been fixed.
Load authorisation cache for pre-trade orders API only once
Ensure grid properties activated because they contain non-empty data stays active when switching to another layout.
Flaky test ignored
Add assertion for call money transactions that do not belong to corresponding collateral pool.
This is an internal change for integration tests. The change has no impact on customers.

This regards transactions from the window ‘Exercise FX Options’ and similar transactions  in the Trade Manager. The calculation of the settlement amount as a sum of amount components should not be altered in the classical window.
FX placement now can be auto-allocated when done for day flag is received
Added validation which prevents auto allocation via MM or batch job for multi-currency calls via CASSINI
Additional check if the TRS is Forward Starting is added while looking for the relevant position: Forward Started TRSs are not supported at the moment
Improve validation message for swap rate correlation standard contracts
Tests modified to be not flaky
Added Managed Identity connection type for AM cache services
Fixed an error that occurred when updating capital event static data for ADRs and Fund certificates with data from a new CA notification for an existing capital event.

In the 'Portfolio Calculation' wrongly an error message complaining about missing prices could appear, incase a position was lend out and part of a hedge relationship at the same time. This has been fixed.
When finding the settlement date for an XpressInstrument via Capture Trade in the Order Manager, the holiday calendar specified for the instrument was not taken correctly into account.
OM Automation service to use unmanaged oracle driver to be consistent with the rest of OM
In explain price search the Quoted + yield curve price method for mid-curve swaptions was incorrectly labelled as "Theoretical price, mid-curve swaptions"
Fix a possible issue in OM allocation block transaction creation for CDS index. Disable recalculation of notional when dictated by block.
Unit test related. Is not visible to a user of SCD
YieldForMathAdjSold should be calculated for average financial accounting method
Feature switch to use the new Front Office Data service is off by default. As a result, for new client Balancer does not work. Fixed. Now new Front Office Data service is used by default.
There was no authorisation for Portfolio Groups (only for Portfolios) in Trade Manager. This was fixed here.
Adding more resilience and logging to internalwebrequest CDL command
Flaky test ignored
IMW updates: fix for Dims: Fra Security, Future Security, Performance Investment Structure. New dims/facts for Lineage. New fact PFC Cash Flow
The Rule entry - Credit Risk fields Collateral, issuer risk and Collateral, cpt. risk have now been re-enabled for holding base rules.
Fix program error during payment reconciliation of private debt for cases when there was not enough data to update subledgers.
A database error can occur for appendable portfolio calculation using the "Recalculate changed" setting. The error has been corrected.
Avoid 0 qty orders in blotter after merging programs
Apply price rounding correctly when allocating multiple Future placements from OM
CustomerApplyNote: Apply price rounding correctly when allocating multiple Future placements from OM

ChangeNote: Perform single heartbeat when NATS connection dropped and re-established
When scrolling over templates in AM Settings Template, Cash Viewer tab display is updating.

When calculating risk factor standard predictive and successive scenarios, the inflation curves risk factors were previously shocked in a way that was inconsistent with other yield-based risk factors. This inconsistency has now been corrected.
Skip redistribution of carried nominal for internal trade, so it will not be recalculated.
Suggested allocation date check was added in Allocation handler.
This change corrects some problems when importing into initially closed fields using only a single import sequence group.
Update OASYS CBU to handle auxiliary job definitions.
It was possible to create Reallocation Security No into security with incomplete static data. It has been fixed.
Change  0 values in generated file to empty, fix validations issues
Added function that copying Trading Platform field to the second leg
YieldForMathAdjSold to be present in MPV and TL
In the Asset Manager (Order Outbox applet), data is not displayed when the user changes the default role. The resolution is to consume the User Context in the Authorization Handler Provider class.
Conversion to dereference OASYS auxiliary job types and functionalities
The 'Economic Benefit' was calculated wrongly on 'Settle Loan Facilities' transactions. This has been fixed.
Ensure online static data updates are coming through for Workflow service
CompetingBids now contains quotation type IndexedPrice for received FIX bids with PriceType Price when instrument quotation type is IndexedPrice
Ensure that the minimum version of FNS is 25.10
Batch job "FIPA Effects Calculation - Upload Results" can only be seen if FIPA Effects Calculation module is installed.
Amend allocation of FX netted placements

Trade Manager/OTC API: Fix issue with incorrect field name in error messages related to empty security ID fields

Trade Manager Loan facility with GCA enabled: Payment amount GC is now updated when Cost/Tax is changed

Disabled the Corporate action specific transaction codes on the Bond swap for release as feature is not yet complete

Use a different counting mechanism

In the schema for OTC Search Web API the item pointer 'IML_instrument_type' is replaced with 'IML_OTC_instrument_type'. Now GET and DELETE endpoints in the OTC Web API work as expected for XpressInstruments with specified IML instrument sub-type
Unfunded value PC was not recalculated on Settle Loan Facilities when changing Amount in contract's in-subform. That has been fixed now.

In Asset manager (Simulations applet) in FX Single currency window security is now filled after base/price currency is filled. This ensures correct security selection according to FX simulations defaults.
Margin Manager -> Interest Statements tracker applet: Provide a Margin Manager user possibility to choose reason and comment on "Dispute Their Interest Statement" action.
Do not check mandatory fields from state controls when passing unsettled trades from Asset Manager to Front office Portfolio calculations copy.

For External and Internal message queues updated a mechanism that check if the data received from DB is correct and non-ambiguous. Add solution for cases when we retrieve only one data row with data info for requested transaction number.
Collateral Cassini integration:  issue a message to user regarding not recommended AccrIntCalc settings on Pool.
Reverted an earlier data import error formatting change.
Crash in Asset manager after deletion of FX Swap simulation. Fixed.
Use Pinned Connection
Handler for tables which have the same form via different command iks
Correction  of programm error found when saving General reconciliation results
Respect the 'min_log_level' cnf.ini parameter in OTEL.
High availability of the FIX API service
Margin Management: Margin Calls with RecalReceive action and Parties Suggested Margin were not applicable for allocation via Simplex if a zero-balance Margin Account existed. Fixed.
N/A: Internal change: clients should not be affected, SmartQueue performance test improving.
GROUPCODEVALS dependency is added to the Compliance Rule configuration transport if Group Code attribute with textual value defines the rule.
In some situations the message queue service did not respect the creation order of messages within a discrete group. This has been corrected.

The error message 'It is not allowed to move cash between different portfolio masters' could wrongly appear when trying to load a transaction into the 'Overnight Account Payments' window. This has been fixed.

A correction is made to the factor based FIPA fair cash flow on decomposed spot legs of IRF positions in Performance Calculation. This affects the fair cash flow itself as well as the factor based FIPA local return, when this is calculated using the TWR based approach. The correction ensures that the cash flow adjustment is consistently based on exposure, which removes spikes in the factor based FIPA local return on decomposed IRF positions on days with buy or sell transactions.
[TECHNICAL/3T]  Re-enabled filter viewing. Item fields of item type 1, that are not drop-downs, should still have item sets.
An error could occur when processing 'Awaited Fund Events' on the STP service. This has been fixed.
The performance of the 'Portfolio Calculations' 'Recalculation changed' initialize process has been improved.
Flaky test ignored
for OneLib Mid curve swaptions, when filling correlation data for interpolation, interpolate first in rows  and then in option maturities
Update of internal SimCorp tool, which does not affect any customer installations
Fixed a possible crash in order auxiliary job functionality. The crash could happen during the order update when the aux job fields include some security static data field.
Read ApiBaseURLPrefix dynamically from cnf.ini

When allocating order block allocations from the Order Manager using a CDS Index standard product, an error message saying "Standard Product ID is a mandatory field and must be specified if Security group is defined as False" could occur. The missing ID is now populated with a Standard Product ID.
Increasing api test coverage for delta vector
2T GUI update flow was called in 3T which cleared update flags!
Resolve leak in UP ConnectionPool and F.Data.Managed
Converting Order Manager FIX API service to NET8

After the CDS reversioning transaction, the new position could not be netted due to inconsistency in the security and original transaction number in the nominal match holdings. Here it has been fixed, the position netting transaction can be successfully saved.
Remove A_COLLATERAL_SUBRESULTS.MIN_RETURN_AMOUNT field from Standard Reports
When there are several resulrities with imported sensitivties with intercection risk factors - risk infor was formed incorrectly. It has been fixed.
Added dynamic reading of swagger.json version for downstream services
testBrick_UtilEndTransPreConditions removed from the brick test
Flaky test has been fixed and re-enabled again.
QC and PC key ratios were not not calculated for mid-curve swaptions using OneLib valuation. Resolved by setting pool factor to 1

Now, in the CTM screen, if a transaction that has only outgoing messages is selected, then the "Open Match" button in the form is enabled. If you press the button, the form "Match" will open and the tab "Deviations" will be activated. The figures of deviations will look like you get an empty (contains only zeros) confirmation message.
Change in internal tests, no impact on customer installations
Disabled the Corporate action specific transaction codes on the Bond swap for release as feature is not yet complete

For External and Internal message queues add a mechanism to check if the data received from DB (that is used to update Int and Ext message queues) represents the correct "Security" in scope of the requested "Transaction No".
Fix ORA-00001: unique constraint violation (SCDAT.P_DWHSYNCACTIONS) during Import of DATAWAREHOUSE entity
Update InputFieldDefinition fields when a new row is created

"Value filled PC absolute" and "Value filled QC absolute" was 100x the value as expected in OOB for Finished orders with special currency (like GBp/GBP). This was corrected together with Indicative price.
Reduce workspace requirement during initialisation phase of position calculation during decomposition
Fix a crash in OM allocation message processing for FX swaps

Rounding rules were not applied to the suggested margin amount for Margin Call with Return/Recall actions when the setting in Collateral Manager setup => Collateral Calculations => "Ignore MTA and rounding on full return/recall amount" is On. It was fixed.
A tab 'Investment Analytics Service - FIPA' has been made configurable.
Ensure that for MidCurve Swaptions the interpolated correlation cannot be outside the [-1,1] limits.
A problem with generic payment matching using manual payment reconciliation and external netting was found and fixed
UDKR weight fields were not excluded from calculation and streaming, fixed now.
Fix Asset Manager Cache API crash when we use GroupBy at web API request
Two Front office data service load balancers could handle the service queue in case of reconnection to another MUCS and two such services run.  This has now been corrected.
The lifetime for liquidating funds has been slightly adjusted so additional distributions are forecasted.
Added validation rule to Float Rate Index Definitions form. Now Customer Business Centre only allowed for TRSs
